Animated comedy, with the voices of Sandra Bullock, Pierre Coffin, Jon Hamm and Michael Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Heroic flightless birds Skipper, Kowalski, Private and Rico uncover a plot to take over the world. Needing help to foil the evil scheme, they seek out a secret society of animal agents, led by a heroic wolf. Animated comedy spin-off, with the voices of Benedict Cumberbatch, John Malkovich and Tom McGrath.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Adolescent wizard Harry is unexpectedly chosen to represent Hogwarts School in a prestigious magical tournament, despite being legally too young to enter. Along with charming sixth-year student Cedric Diggory, Harry is chosen to represent Hogwarts in the contest, with champions of two other magical academies visiting the school to face deadly monsters in a series of death-defying challenges. Meanwhile, the followers of the dreaded Lord Voldemort plot to restore their master to the land of the living. Fourth instalment of the fantasy saga, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Robbie Coltrane, Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Brendan Gleeson and Robert Pattinson.(n)

programme.title: Return to Sender
programme.desc: A small-town nurse goes on a blind date with a stranger who rapes her. As she struggles to rebuild her life, she takes to regularly visiting her attacker in prison. However, when he is released, he discovers she has been planning her revenge. Thriller, starring Rosamund Pike, Shiloh Fernandez and Nick Nolte(n).

programme.title: New Jack City
programme.desc: Two maverick cops set out to topple a drugs baron who has transformed an apartment block into a seemingly impregnable fortress, but reckon without the villain's determination to stay out of jail - leading to explosive confrontations. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Ice-T, Judd Nelson, Chris Rock and Allen Payne(n).

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet(n).

programme.title: Night Falls on Manhattan
programme.desc: A cop-turned-attorney finds himself at the mercy of the publicity machine when he is unexpectedly put in charge of prosecuting the drug lord who shot his policeman father during a bust - and the plot thickens when the attorney discovers the lawmen might not have been playing by the rules. Sidney Lumet's thriller, starring Andy Garcia, Richard Dreyfuss, Ian Holm, James Gandolfini and Lena Olin(n).

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: A reformed criminal's daughter is murdered, and he becomes convinced she was killed at the order of a Russian gangster he once stole from. He and his former partners in crime launch a campaign of violence against the mobster and his cronies, but his wife begins to fear for what his mission of vengeance will turn him into. Crime thriller, starring Nicolas Cage and Danny Glover(n).

programme.title: The Calling
programme.desc: A small-town cop with a drink problem discovers someone is mutilating and murdering people across her district. She realises that the serial killer is hiding a mysterious message inspired by ancient religious texts and becomes dangerously obsessed with deciphering its meaning. Crime thriller based on Inger Ash Wolfe's novel, starring Susan Sarandon and Donald Sutherland(n).

programme.title: Dead Again
programme.desc: A private detective tries to solve the mystery surrounding a woman suffering from amnesia. With the aid of hypnosis, he discovers she is the reincarnation of a murder victim from the 1940s, and that history may be fated to repeat itself. Thriller, starring and directed by Kenneth Branagh. With Emma Thompson, Derek Jacobi, Andy Garcia and Robin Williams(n).

programme.title: After the Sunset
programme.desc: A veteran jewel thief seems to have it all, enjoying a relaxing retirement in a Caribbean paradise - but the lure of one last heist looks set to be his downfall as an old enemy plots to finally collar the crook. Comedy thriller, starring Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Woody Harrelson, Don Cheadle and Naomie Harris(n).

programme.title: Supremacy
programme.desc: A white supremacist kills a policeman on his first day after being released from jail, jeopardising the task he has been given by an imprisoned gang leader. He and his girlfriend try to avoid being recaptured by taking a family hostage, and are drawn into a battle of wills with the father, who is also an ex-convict. Crime drama, starring Joe Anderson and Danny Glover(n).

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis(n).

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: An imprisoned art thief and forger learns that his son is dying, and applies for early release. While his request is granted, he learns that the shady characters who granted his freedom want him to assist them in a daring heist, leaving him torn between carrying out the robbery and making his son's last wishes come true. Crime thriller, starring John Travolta and Christopher Plummer(n).

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince an Irish gypsy to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchie's comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham(n).

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: Five criminals are brought together by a police line-up, and decide to join forces to pull off one more big job. However, they discover their meeting was not a coincidence and that a mysterious crime lord has plans for them. Bryan Singer's Oscar-winning thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Kevin Spacey, Benicio Del Toro, Kevin Pollak, Stephen Baldwin, Pete Postlethwaite, Chazz Palminteri and Suzy Amis(n).

programme.title: SWAT
programme.desc: A cop's career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell.(n)

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: Two South African police officers, one black and one white, investigate the murder of a teenage girl. The case brings to light the lingering consequences of apartheid, and forces both men to face up to their own roles in their country's brutal history. Crime drama based on Caryl Ferey's novel, with Forest Whitaker and Orlando Bloom.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: Hannah, the niece of Southern drugs kingpin Frank Stinson, longs to escape the spiral of violence that dominates her existence. When her impressionable sister Amber falls in love with Wild Bill, one of Uncle Frank's bitter rivals, Hannah spots a way to finally put an end to her misery by using her guile to pit the two men against each other in a vengeful game. Crime thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Sean Bean and Alexa Vega.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A veteran con man takes a young femme fatale under his wing, but dumps her when their relationship looks set to turn to love. Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.(n)

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset.(n)

programme.title: The Pelican Brief
programme.desc: A talented law student submits a brief about an obscure case linked to the assassinations of two judges. However, she unwittingly gets too close to the truth that the government is behind the murders and seeks a journalist's aide in proving her theory before she is assassinated. Legal thriller based on the book by John Grisham, starring Julia Roberts, Denzel Washington, Stanley Tucci and Sam Shepard.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A veteran con man takes a young femme fatale under his wing, but dumps her when their relationship looks set to turn to love. Three years later, they cross paths again - and it seems his former protege is about to use the skills he taught her to scupper his latest heist. Comedy crime drama, starring Will Smith and Margot Robbie.(n)

programme.title: The Captive
programme.desc: A couple are plagued by the disappearance of their young daughter, eight years after she went missing, and a series of disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she is still alive. Thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds, Kevin Durand, Mireille Enos and Rosario Dawson.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A political lobbyist recovering from a painful break-up forms a passionate new relationship with a charming stranger. However, she begins to wonder whether she can trust her new boyfriend has his behaviour grows increasingly volatile - a situation that only gets worse when her ex resurfaces. Thriller, starring Sanaa Lathan and Michael Ealy.(n)

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: A courier is kidnapped and forced to become a drug mule. When she is exposed to the experimental chemicals she is smuggling, it boosts her intelligence and reflexes to superhuman levels. She uses her newfound abilities to get revenge on her captors, but as the process continues, she evolves into something more than human. Sci-fi thriller, starring Scarlett Johansson and Morgan Freeman(n).

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown(n).

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Film-makers venture deep into the Amazon jungle to document the lives of a remote tribe. However, the expedition is hijacked by a crazed hunter who plans to use them as bait to catch a gigantic killer snake. Adventure, starring Jennifer Lopez, Jon Voight, Ice Cube, Eric Stoltz and Jonathan Hyde(n).

programme.title: The X Files
programme.desc: FBI special agents Mulder and Scully are reassigned from their paranormal investigations to deal with a terrorist attack on a government building. They discover the bombing is an attempt to cover up the existence of an alien virus that threatens all life on Earth. Sci-fi thriller based on the TV series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Martin Landau and Armin Mueller-Stahl(n).

programme.title: Jeruzalem
programme.desc: Two American tourists take a trip to Jerusalem and befriend a local anthropology student who offers to be their guide to the holy city. However, their holiday takes a hellish turn when a biblical apocalypse engulfs the city, and they find themselves trapped at the centre of the mayhem. Horror, starring Yael Grobglas and Danielle Jadelyn(n).

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton(n).

programme.title: The Frankenstein Theory
programme.desc: Eccentric academic John Venkenheim has a theory, which suggests Mary Shelley's Frankenstein was not just a gothic fantasy, but actually an account of a ghastly experiment gone wrong. His outlandish views see him suspended from his job as a university professor, and as he resolves to vindicate his academic reputation, but enlists the aid of a documentary crew to follow him to the Arctic Circle in search of the legendary monster. However, what they find in the frozen wastes his more horrific than anything found in Shelley's novel. Found-footage horror, starring Kris Lemche(n).

programme.title: The X Files
programme.desc: FBI special agents Mulder and Scully are reassigned from their paranormal investigations to deal with a terrorist attack on a government building. They discover the bombing is an attempt to cover up the existence of an alien virus that threatens all life on Earth. Sci-fi thriller based on the TV series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson, Martin Landau and Armin Mueller-Stahl(n).

However, what they find in the frozen wastes his more horrific than anything found in Shelley's novel. Found-footage horror, starring Kris Lemche(n).

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: A man searching for his missing sister heads for a disused campsite on the edge of a lake, where a horrific massacre took place years ago. At the same time, a group of students goes to the camp for a party, only to find a masked maniac lurking in the woods with murder in mind. Horror remake, starring Jared Padalecki, Danielle Panabaker, Amanda Righetti and Derek Mears.(n)

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic warrior risks his life to protect a female android who holds the key to curing a man-made plague devastating humanity. However, a host of bloodthirsty warriors are determined to stop them getting to the scientists who need the information. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dayle Haddon, Deborah Richter and Vincent Klyn.(n)

programme.title: Project: ALF
programme.desc: A lovable alien is captured by the US army who plan to destroy him, prompting two officers to come to his aid. Spin-off from the sci-fi comedy TV series, with Miguel Ferrer, Ed Begley Jr and Martin Sheen.(n)

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder.(n)

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: A scientist researching Alzheimer's disease devises a way to enlarge the brains of killer sharks on an isolated research facility to help develop her theories. However, the experiments result in a marked increase in the creatures' intelligence, and before long they manage to escape their confinement - with bloody consequences. Thriller, starring Saffron Burrows, Thomas Jane, Stellan Skarsgard, LL Cool J and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A boy arrives in an isolated community of children, with no memory of who he is or the outside world. When another new arrival brings an ominous message, he realises time is running out for the group and they must find an escape route through a deadly labyrinth if they are to survive. Sci-fi adventure based on James Dashner's novel, starring Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario and Patricia Clarkson.(n)

programme.title: X-Men 2
programme.desc: Mutant heroes the X-Men are forced into an uneasy alliance with arch-enemy Magneto to battle a common foe. Following an attempt on the president's life, a sinister military scientist launches a raid on Professor Xavier's school and hatches a plan to rid the world of all mutants. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Alan Cumming, Halle Berry and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A boy arrives in an isolated community of children, with no memory of who he is or the outside world. When another new arrival brings an ominous message, he realises time is running out for the group and they must find an escape route through a deadly labyrinth if they are to survive. Sci-fi adventure based on James Dashner's novel, starring Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario and Patricia Clarkson.(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A thief attempting to go straight is recruited by a scientist, who provides him with a suit that gives him the power to shrink. He must use his new skills to carry out a special mission - helping the inventor to steal back his miniaturisation technology from a ruthless businessman who intends to turn it into a deadly weapon. Superhero adventure, starring Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas and Evangeline Lilly.(n)

programme.title: X-Men 2
programme.desc: Mutant heroes the X-Men are forced into an uneasy alliance with arch-enemy Magneto to battle a common foe. Following an attempt on the president's life, a sinister military scientist launches a raid on Professor Xavier's school and hatches a plan to rid the world of all mutants. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Alan Cumming, Halle Berry and Brian Cox.(n)

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: A Brooklyn bartender secretly provides a service delivering shipments of money to local gangsters. His criminal connections lead to his involvement in a robbery that goes disastrously wrong and digs up the long-buried secrets from his neighbourhood's past. Crime drama based on a short story by Dennis Lehane, starring Tom Hardy, Noomi Rapace and James Gandolfini in his final film role(n).

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
programme.desc: Retired bank robber John Doherty escapes a gunman with the aid of a young car thief, and together they go in search of the loot from the former crook's last job. When they discover the stash is missing - and John's thuggish old partners are also looking for it - the pair decide to do a repeat robbery. Comedy drama, starring Clint Eastwood, Jeff Bridges, George Kennedy and Geoffrey Lewis(n).

programme.title: Gunfight at the OK Corral
programme.desc: US Marshal Wyatt Earp lays down his badge to live a peaceful life with his brothers in the town of Tombstone. As a feud erupts with the ruthless Clanton gang, he forms an unlikely alliance with hard-drinking gambler Doc Holliday to face them in a historic showdown. Western, starring Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas, Dennis Hopper, Lee Van Cleef and DeForest Kelley(n).

programme.title: Sixteen
programme.desc: An African former child soldier now living in London tries to leave his violent past behind him as he approaches his 16th birthday, but when he witnesses a stabbing and the people involved want to make sure that he says nothing to the police, violence forces its way back into his life. Thriller, starring Roger Jean Nsengiyumva, Rachael Stirling and Rosie Day(n).

programme.title: The Sea Inside
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a fisherman who is paralysed from the neck down in a diving accident. After spending years dependent on others to take care of him, he decides to fight for the legal right to end his own life. Starring Javier Bardem, Belen Rueda and Lola Duenas. In Spanish, Catalan and Galician(n).

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Boxer Rubin `Hurricane' Carter dreams of winning the middleweight world title, only to be wrongfully thrown into prison for the murders of three people in a bar. Nineteen years later, a teenager reads the fighter's autobiography and sets out on a campaign to free him. Fact-based drama, starring Denzel Washington, John Hannah, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber and Dan Hedaya(n).

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers
programme.desc: The stories of three of the men in the famous photograph of US servicemen raising their flag on the island of Iwo Jima. After returning home from the battlefield, the veterans grapple with an increasing sense of survivor guilt as they struggle to adjust to everyday life. Clint Eastwood's Second World War drama, starring Adam Beach, Ryan Phillippe, Jesse Bradford, Jamie Bell and Paul Walker(n).

programme.title: Blazing Saddles
programme.desc: A crooked railway tycoon whose men are terrorising a frontier town arranges for a black sheriff to be appointed, hoping the racist residents will reject him. The lawman proves more cunning than expected, and with the help of a drunken gunslinger, runs rings around the businessman. Mel Brooks' Western spoof, in which he co-stars alongside Cleavon Little, Gene Wilder and Madeline Kahn(n).

programme.title: Theeb
programme.desc: A Bedouin boy living in an Ottoman province during the First World War offers to help his brother guide a British officer on a perilous journey through the desert to a secret destination. He gradually becomes more aware of the devastating events occurring in the world around him and is forced to grow up quickly. Drama, starring Jacir Eid Al-Hwietat and Jack Fox. In Arabic(n).

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: A Danish settler in the Wild West is joined by his wife and son, but they are soon murdered. He avenges their deaths, but his actions attract the wrath of a ruthless gang leader. Abandoned by his friends and neighbours, the peaceful pioneer is forced to stand alone to enforce the law in his new home. Western, starring Mads Mikkelsen and Eva Green(n).

programme.title: The Commitments
programme.desc: A would-be music producer from Dublin believes he can make it big in Ireland by promoting a top-rate soul band, so he trawls a working-class neighbourhood and auditions unlikely singers and musicians to put together as a group. Alan Parker's urban comedy, based on the novel by Roddy Doyle, starring Robert Arkins, Andrew Strong, Michael Aherne, Angeline Ball and Maria Doyle Kennedy(n).

programme.title: Sixteen
programme.desc: An African former child soldier now living in London tries to leave his violent past behind him as he approaches his 16th birthday, but when he witnesses a stabbing and the people involved want to make sure that he says nothing to the police, violence forces its way back into his life. Thriller, starring Roger Jean Nsengiyumva, Rachael Stirling and Rosie Day(n).

programme.title: Four Corners
programme.desc: A 13-year-old boy raised in South Africa's Cape Flats gets caught up in a volatile subculture dominated by two rival gangs. Thriller, starring Brendon Daniels, Jezriel Skei and Lindiwe Matshikiza(n).

programme.title: Klute
programme.desc: A private detective investigates the disappearance of a scientist in New York, but finds his only lead is a prostitute with a tenuous connection to the missing man - and his attempts to gain her help are soon hampered by shadowy figures intent on silencing her. Alan J Pakula's thriller, starring Donald Sutherland, Roy Scheider and an Oscar-winning Jane Fonda.(n)

programme.title: A Dirty Shame
programme.desc: A bump on the head transforms a sexually repressed housewife into a sex-addicted exhibitionist - who, finding her husband can no longer fulfil her needs, goes in search of satisfaction in Baltimore's seedy underworld. John Waters' comedy, starring Tracey Ullman, Johnny Knoxville, Selma Blair and Chris Isaak.(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote d'Azur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-winning romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis.(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green.(n)

programme.title: Million Dollar Baby
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck boxing coach nurses a grudge because his best fighter has abandoned him for the big time. When a 31-year-old waitress turns up asking him to train her, he refuses outright. However, her persistence wins him round and the pair go on to form a strong professional partnership and successful career. Oscar-winning drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Hilary Swank, Morgan Freeman and Anthony Mackie.(n)

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: An awkward teenager shuns all kinds of social interaction, apart from making films with his best friend. His well-meaning mother urges him to spend time with a girl who has been diagnosed with leukaemia, and they unexpectedly develop a firm friendship. However, his life is changed forever as her condition gets worse. Comedy drama based on Jesse Andrews' novel, starring Thomas Mann, RJ Cyler and Olivia Cooke.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: Full Metal Jacket
programme.desc: Raw recruits undergo harsh training under a domineering Marine drill sergeant after being called up for service in the Vietnam War, but his brutal methods lead to the breakdown of one of his cadets. Eventually, some of the fully trained soldiers get their first taste of combat in 1968. Stanley Kubrick's drama, starring Matthew Modine, Adam Baldwin, Vincent D'Onofrio and R Lee Ermey.(n)

programme.desc: A cynical sales rep for a pharmaceutical company applies the charm he uses on his customers to the task of seducing a succession of women. He starts a purely sexual relationship with a waitress, who has Parkinson's disease and is even less interested in commitment than he is, only to find himself falling in love. Romantic comedy drama based on Jamie Reidy's book Hard Sell: The Evolution of a Viagra Salesman, starring Jake Gyllenhaal and Anne Hathaway(n).

programme.title: Krull
programme.desc: Villainous monster the Beast invades a magical land, where his henchmen kidnap a princess the night before her wedding. Her fiance sets out in search of a mythical weapon to rescue her, aided by a band of thieves, a wise old hermit, a bumbling wizard and a mysterious Cyclops. Fantasy adventure, starring Ken Marshall, Lysette Anthony, Freddie Jones, Francesca Annis, Robbie Coltrane and Liam Neeson(n).

programme.title: The Tale of the Princess Kaguya
programme.desc: An elderly bamboo cutter finds a tiny princess hidden in a tree, little realising she will grow up to be a beautiful, strong-willed woman. After receiving several marriage proposals, she sets her suitors a variety of challenges in an attempt to learn which of them deserves to win her heart. Animated fantasy, featuring the voice of Chloe Grace Moretz, James Caan and Mary Steenburgen(n).

programme.desc: Princess Mia of Genovia discovers that although she is supposed to take the throne on her 21st birthday, unmarried women like her are barred from being head of state. She now has just 30 days to find herself a husband - but an ambitious nobleman is determined to sabotage her hopes of romance. Family comedy sequel, with Anne Hathaway, Hector Elizondo, Julie Andrews, John Rhys-Davies and Chris Pine(n).

programme.title: The Way Back

Refusing to live under Stalin's rule, they embark on a gruelling 4,500-mile journey across inhospitable terrain to escape the Soviet Union. Peter Weir's drama, starring Ed Harris, Colin Farrell, Saoirse Ronan, Jim Sturgess and Mark Strong(n).

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Telepathic mutant Charles Xavier forms the first generation of the superhero team in the 1960s. Their battle with a Nazi war criminal manipulating the world toward nuclear war gradually drives a wedge between Xavier and his ally Magneto, leading them to become deadly enemies. Superhero adventure prequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence(n).

programme.title: The Counsellor
programme.desc: A lawyer who earns a living representing drug dealers makes a fateful decision to take an active role in their criminal activities. He quickly finds himself out of his depth in a criminal underworld he barely understands, where his actions bring deadly consequences. Ridley Scott's crime thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Penelope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Javier Bardem and Brad Pitt(n).

programme.title: Room 237
programme.desc: Documentary in which five fans of Stanley Kubrick's horror movie The Shining analyse the film's imagery and share their differing theories on hidden messages they believe the director planted, ranging from metaphors for genocide or government conspiracy, to a confession from Kubrick of faking the moon landings.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
programme.desc: A boy starts a new school determined to be popular and admired, only to find himself instead a target for bullies. He documents his experiences in a journal as he sets out on a series of attempts to gain the respect he feels he deserves - but his every effort ends in disaster. Family comedy, with Zachary Gordon, Robert Capron and Chloe Grace Moretz.(n)

programme.title: Tooth
programme.desc: A rebellious tooth fairy grows tired of her daily coin-collecting duties and decides to deposit a hefty sum of cash in the home of a young girl and her brother. However, she discovers her actions have jeopardised the plans for Christmas in her homeland of Fairytopia. Children's fantasy adventure, starring Yasmin Paige, Harry Enfield, Richard E Grant, Jim Broadbent and Stephen Fry.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A clumsy security guard is critically injured during a run-in with a thief, so his cybernetics-expert employer transforms him into the ultimate crime-fighting machine - a bionic officer with an array of gadgets and weaponry cunningly concealed inside his body. Disney comedy adventure based on the 1980s cartoon series, starring Matthew Broderick, Rupert Everett and Joely Fisher.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: A cataclysm leaves prehistoric animals Manny, Sid and Diego lost at sea on a drifting iceberg. They try to find a way to return home, embarking on a journey that leads to an encounter with a ferocious band of piratical creatures. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary and Peter Dinklage.(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. With star player Dottie Hinson and her sister Kit on board, they look set to dominate the league - until sibling rivalry rears its head. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna.(n)

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: A con-woman acquires an executive's credit card numbers, and lives a life of luxury at his expense. The outraged victim sets out on a mission to track down the fraudster and bring her to justice personally - resulting in them travelling on a disastrous road trip across America together. Comedy, with Jason Bateman, Melissa McCarthy, Jon Favreau and Amanda Peet.(n)

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: A 15th-century Transylvanian knight becomes a vampire after the death of his beloved wife. Centuries later, he learns she has been reincarnated, and travels to Victorian London with the intent of seducing her into joining him in living death. Francis Ford Coppola's Gothic horror based on the novel, starring Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins and Keanu Reeves.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: After finding himself unable to shoot a turkey while on a hunting trip, John-Boy displays his courage by saving his father's life(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Budding author John-Boy secretly borrows a typewriter to further his career, but sister Mary Ellen causes him no end of trouble by selling it to the local junk collector. Starring Richard Thomas and Judy Norton(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Oleson's wealthy nephew arrives in Walnut Grove to stay with the Ingalls family. The youngster, who has a troubled past, soon he learns a few lessons about life and love(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Pregnant Caroline worries that the baby she is carrying will not be the boy her husband has always wanted(n).

programme.title: Two Small Voices
programme.desc: Two women follow their doctor's advice and have breast implants but they soon become seriously ill. Fact-based drama, starring Mary McDonnell and Gail O'Grady(n).

programme.title: Santa and Pete
programme.desc: A widower worries about facing his first Christmas since his wife died, but finds comfort in telling his 10-year-old grandson a traditional Dutch tale about Father Christmas's amazing travels, including an occasion when the jolly old fellow needed help from a kindly cook. Children's fantasy, starring James Earl Jones, Hume Cronyn, Flex Alexander, Tempestt Bledsoe, Emily Mae Young and Sedrathe Gillespie(n).

programme.title: No One Would Tell
programme.desc: A shy teenager thinks all her dreams have come true when the school's star athlete asks her out. However, the relationship soon turns sour as her seemingly perfect boyfriend becomes possessive, controlling and violent. Drama, starring Fred Savage, Candace Cameron Bure, Gregory Alan Williams and Rodney Eastman(n).

programme.title: DC 9/11: Time of Crisis
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, as people across America attempted to come to terms with the tragedy, focusing on the reaction of President George W Bush and the advice given by his many advisors. Timothy Bottoms, John Cunningham, Andrew Gillies, Penny Johnson and Doug Lennox star(n).

programme.title: The Forget-Me-Not Murders
programme.desc: A policeman races against time to find a serial killer who leaves dried flowers next to each of his victims, and the chase becomes even more desperate when he learns that his goddaughter could be next on the murderer's list. Detective thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Tyne Daly, Cliff Gorman and Neve Campbell(n).

programme.title: Her Desperate Choice
programme.desc: A woman flees the authorities in an attempt to protect her daughter from the child's paedophile father and seeks the help of an underground organisation dedicated to protecting abused youngsters. Drama, with Kyle Secor, Faith Ford, Hanna R Hall and Nigel Bennett(n).

programme.title: Crimes of Passion: Victim of Love
programme.desc: A sinister killer marries then murders a naive woman, prompting her parents to begin a relentless fight to bring him to justice. Fact-based drama, with Dwight Schultz, Bonnie Bartlett, Andy Romano and Dennis Boutsikaris(n).

programme.title: Jack Reed: One of Our Own
programme.desc: The maverick detective's partner is murdered by a hitman they were investigating and he sets out to bring him to justice with the help of the killer's girlfriend. Thriller, directed by and starring Brian Dennehy. With Susan Ruttan, Charles Dutton and CCH Pounder(n).

programme.title: Field Punishment No 1
programme.desc: The New Zealand army forcibly transports 14 conscientious objectors to the European front lines during the First World War. The men struggle to cling to their principles through brutal treatment in a series of military prisons, mental hospitals and battlefields. Fact-based drama, starring Fraser Brown and Byron Coll(n).

programme.title: Painful Secrets
programme.desc: A teenage girl reacts to stressful times by harming herself, and the misjudged reactions of friends and family only serve to make the problem worse. Drama, starring Kimberlee Peterson, Sean Young and Robert Wisden(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A meteorite lands in the Baldwin sisters' recipe room, causing quite a stir among the locals who believe it to be a heaven-sent omen of hope.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A minister comes to stay with the Waltons, but his presence soon sparks off all manner of religious ructions.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Waving as You Drive Away - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls family faces yet more tribulation as Mary's eyesight deteriorates. Drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Waving as You Drive Away - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mary becomes bitter about losing her sight, prompting Charles to enrol her in a school for the blind.(n)

programme.title: A Father's Betrayal
programme.desc: A respected senior attorney faces accusations of rape against a friend of his son, who is also a lawyer, leading to professional and personal conflicts in the family as his nearest and dearest are caught up in the controversial case. Drama, directed by and starring Brian Dennehy, with Lynn Redgrave, Reed Diamond, Alice Krige and Michael David Simms.(n)

programme.title: Brave New Girl
programme.desc: A teenage girl struggles to realise her dreams of stardom while trying to shake off the shackles of her humble Texas upbringing. Fortunately, she has her mother behind her, offering encouragement when the going gets tough. Family drama, based on the book A Mother's Gift by Britney and Lynne Spears, starring Lindsey Haun, Virginia Madsen and Jackie Rosenbaum.(n)

programme.title: Complex of Fear
programme.desc: A rookie cop is assigned the tough case of tracking down a killer wreaking havoc among the residents of a housing development - and all the clues point to one of his friends. Thriller, starring Joe Don Baker, Hart Bochner and Chelsea Field.(n)

programme.title: Mayflower Madam
programme.desc: Fact-based drama based on the life of former debutante Sydney Biddle Barrows, a descendent of the Mayflower pilgrims, who became notorious as the proprietor of a high-class New York escort agency. Candice Bergen, Chris Sarandon and Chita Rivera star.(n)

programme.title: Remembrance of Love
programme.desc: A widowed concentration camp survivor searches for the woman he loved and lost as a teenager during the Holocaust. Romantic drama, with Pam Dawber and Chana Eden.(n)

programme.title: A Silent Night
programme.desc: A mother and her son are caught in the middle of a Second World War battle and seek shelter in a cabin on Christmas Eve. During the night they are disturbed by three American soldiers and three Germans but she is determined they should keep the peace and enjoy a meal on the holy night. Drama, starring Linda Hamilton, Matthew Harbour and Alan Goulem.(n)

programme.title: One Against the Wind
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War heroine Mary Lindell, who helped freedom fighters and members of the Allied forces escape the clutches of the Nazis in occupied France. Starring Judy Davis, Sam Neill, Denholm Elliot and Kate Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part one of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.(n)

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.(n)

programme.title: Reflections on a Crime
programme.desc: A prison guard begins a friendship with a woman awaiting execution for the murder of her husband, little anticipating the amazing tale she will reveal to him on the night before she dies. Thriller, starring Mimi Rogers, Billy Zane, John Terry and Kurt Fuller.(n)

programme.title: William and Kate: Into the Future
programme.desc: Documentary about the royal couple's relationship, that examines what the future may hold(n).

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan spends Christmas trying to persuade a cynical writer that there is still good in the world(n).

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark pose as priests so they can re-open an abandoned church as shelter for people who have lost their homes in a fire. Guest starring Didi Conn (Grease)(n).

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A criminal flees into the Badlands to escape the partners in crime he betrayed, and a Native American woman comes to his aid. Guest starring John Saxon (A Nightmare on Elm Street)(n).

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A teenager falls in with a gang of men who cut the hides of dead cattle, but Festus tries to persuade him to adopt a law-abiding lifestyle. Guest starring Ned Beatty(n).

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: The angelic trio try to help a domineering mother who rejects her son and pushes her gymnast daughter too hard. Drama, starring Roma Downey and Della Reese(n).

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: The heavenly helpers give advice to a greedy son who tries to trace his inheritance. Roma Downey and Della Reese star(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mary Ellen announces she is engaged to a fellow student, but her hasty marriage is threatened by her feelings for the new town doctor(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mary Ellen announces she is engaged to a fellow student, but her hasty marriage is threatened by her feelings for the new town doctor(n).

programme.title: No One Could Protect Her
programme.desc: A woman is raped in her own home, but the police seem powerless to apprehend the attacker. As reports of further sexual assaults in her neighbourhood mount up, all seemingly the work of the same man, she resolves to turn detective and bring him to justice herself. Thriller based on a true story, starring Joanna Kerns, Anthony John Denison and Peter MacNeill(n).

programme.title: Wife, Mother, Murderer
programme.desc: A woman desperate to escape her small town roots murders her husband, attempts to poison her child and assumes multiple fake identities, even going so far as to fake the death of one of her aliases and take on the guise of her own identical twin sister. Fact-based drama, starring Judith Light and David Ogden Stiers(n).

programme.title: Untamed Love
programme.desc: A teacher who specialises in tutoring children with learning difficulties forms a close bond with a violent girl traumatised by years of physical and psychological abuse. Fact-based drama, starring Cathy Lee Crosby, Ashlee Lauren, John Getz and Richard Fancy(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason has to compose a piece of original music for his course, and draws inspiration from his mountain home(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: The Lord Is My Shepherd - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Ingalls family is delighted by the birth of a new baby boy, Charles Fredrick. Laura becomes jealous and refuses to pray for her new brother's good health. The young boy dies soon afterwards and she is racked with guilt(n).

programme.title: Lethal Seduction
programme.desc: A reporter poses as an illegal immigrant and takes a job in the office of a ruthless, seductive lawyer, hoping to expose her corrupt business practices. However, his pursuit of a story is threatened when he becomes infatuated with her. Comedy drama, starring Melanie Griffith and Esai Morales(n).

programme.title: For the Love of a Child
programme.desc: Two inspirational women who carry out extensive work with abused, neglected and abandoned children around the world. Drama, starring Peri Gilpin, Teri Polo and Maria Del Mar(n).

programme.title: One Against the Wind
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War heroine Mary Lindell, who helped freedom fighters and members of the Allied forces escape the clutches of the Nazis in occupied France. Starring Judy Davis, Sam Neill, Denholm Elliot and Kate Beckinsale(n).

programme.title: Passchendaele
programme.desc: A Canadian soldier is injured in battle during the First World War, and falls for a nurse in the hospital. Declared unfit for duty due to ill health, he is reassigned to a recruitment station - but he tricks his way back to the front line to protect the brother of the woman he loves. Drama, directed by and starring Paul Gross. With Caroline Dhavernas and Joe Dinicol(n).

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark's latest assignment is Wally, a lovable elderly hobo and street puppeteer whose caring and good nature have made him, without him knowing, into an angel. Dick Van Dyke guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Gabe Wilson, an old friend of Mark's, tries to re-build his life after suffering a heart attack. He is reunited with his old flame, but finds out that the woman he once loved has changed.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Newly escorts a prisoner to jail, but finds his captive is being stalked by bounty hunters after the reward money.(n)

programme.desc: After Andre makes a surprise visit to the office, Spencer scrambles to stay ahead; Joe discovers skeletons in his partner's closet; Ricky tries to make amends with Dennis; Charles plots to keep Ricky in Miami; Travis confides in Spencer(n).

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: When astronauts blast off from the planet Mars, they leave behind Mark Watney, presumed dead after a fierce storm. With only a meager amount of supplies, the stranded visitor must utilize his wits and spirit to find a way to survive on the hostile planet. Meanwhile, back on Earth, members of NASA and a team of international scientists work tirelessly to bring him home, while his crew mates hatch their own plan for a daring rescue mission(n).

programme.title: Maps to the Stars
programme.desc: Driven by an intense need for fame and validation, members of a dysfunctional Hollywood dynasty have lives as dramatic as any movie(n).

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: Lanie Kerrigan, a feature reporter at a Seattle television station, leads the ultimate superficial life, even though she thinks she has it all, like a superstar boyfriend, a gorgeous apartment, and a shot at a big network assignment. Her perfect world starts unraveling after a homeless street seer tells Lanie that she leads a meaningless existence, and will die the following week. When the savant's other predictions come true, Lanie begins to re-examine her life and priorities(n).

programme.title: The Crash Reel
programme.desc: Snowboarder Kevin Pearce suffers a traumatic brain injury while training for the 2010 Winter Olympics. His family stands by his side as he struggles through rehab, but they object when he expresses his desire to return to his favorite sport(n).

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Master chef Kate Armstrong runs her life and her kitchen with intimidating intensity. However, a recipe for disaster may be in the works when she becomes the guardian of her young niece while crossing forks with the brash sous-chef who just joined her staff. Though romance blooms in the face of rivalry, Kate needs to look outside the kitchen to find true happiness(n).

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: Life always seems complicated for good ol' Charlie Brown, the boy who always tries his best against seemingly impossible odds. When the Little Red-Haired Girl moves into his neighborhood, Charlie Brown develops a crush on her. Meanwhile, his best friend Snoopy embarks on an epic adventure in a fantasy world. As a World War I flying ace, the lovable beagle pursues his nemesis, the Red Baron, while also trying to win the heart of a beautiful poodle named Fifi(n).

programme.title: The Making Of: The Peanuts Movie
The Bucket List
programme.desc: Billionaire Edward Cole and car mechanic Carter Chambers are complete strangers, until fate lands them in the same hospital room. The men find they have two things in common: a need to come to terms with who they are and what they have done with their lives, and a desire to complete a list of things they want to see and do before they die. Against their doctor's advice, the men leave the hospital and set out on the adventure of a lifetime(n).

programme.title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp With the Los Angeles Rams
In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In 1820, crewmen aboard the New England vessel Essex face a harrowing battle for survival when a whale of mammoth size and strength attacks with force, crippling their ship and leaving them adrift in the ocean. Pushed to their limits and facing storms, starvation, panic and despair, the survivors must resort to the unthinkable to stay alive. Their incredible tale ultimately inspires author Herman Melville to write ``Moby-Dick.''(n).

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Ex-Special Forces operator Frank Martin lives what seems to be a quiet life along the French Mediterranean, hiring himself out as a mercenary transporter who moves goods - human or otherwise - from one place to another. No questions asked. Dangerous complications ensue when he is hired to kidnap the feisty daughter of a lethal Chinese crime lord who's smuggling his fellow countrymen into France(n).

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: After Andre makes a surprise visit to the office, Spencer scrambles to stay ahead; Joe discovers skeletons in his partner's closet; Ricky tries to make amends with Dennis; Charles plots to keep Ricky in Miami; Travis confides in Spencer(n).

programme.title: Michigan vs. Ohio State: The Rivalry
Everest
programme.desc: On the morning of May 10, 1996, climbers from two expeditions start their final ascent toward the summit of Mount Everest, the highest point on Earth. With little warning, a violent storm strikes the mountain, engulfing the adventurers in one of the fiercest blizzards ever encountered by man. Challenged by the harshest conditions imaginable, the teams must endure blistering winds and freezing temperatures in an epic battle to survive against nearly impossible odds(n).

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: Ever since her father drilled into her head that monogamy isn't realistic, magazine writer Amy has made promiscuity her credo. As much as she enjoys an uninhibited life free of commitment, Amy is really in a rut. While writing a profile about charming and successful sports doctor Aaron Conners, she finds herself actually falling in love for the first time -- and what's more, Aaron seems to like her too. Amy starts to wonder if it's time to clean up her act(n).

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: After defeating international terrorist Owen Shaw, Dominic Toretto, Brian O'Conner and the rest of the crew have separated to return to more normal lives. However, Deckard Shaw, Owen's older brother, is thirsty for revenge. A slick government agent offers to help Dom and company take care of Shaw in exchange for their help in rescuing a kidnapped computer hacker who has developed a powerful surveillance program.(n)

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Aimless David Rice has the ability to instantly transport himself to any place he can imagine. He uses that gift to globe-trot, living on money he steals by ''jumping'' into bank vaults. He's captured by the evil Roland Cox, who knows how to keep David from jumping. David escapes and reunites with his high school crush, Millie, then forms an alliance with fellow jumper Griffin and prepares for mortal combat with Cox.(n)

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: With support from his loving wife Gerda, artist Einar Wegener prepares to undergo one of the first sex-change operations.(n)

programme.title: The Comebacks
programme.desc: Lambeau Fields, the worst coach in the history of college football, gets a final chance to redeem himself at Heartland State University. Scouring the campus for talent, Fields winds up with a ragtag team of misfits who must be whipped into shape both on and off the field. Unbelievably, his unorthodox training methods work, and the teammates find themselves in the playoffs against the Lone Star State Unbeatables.(n)

programme.title: Hard Knocks: Training Camp With the Los Angeles Rams
Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean and his gang hatch an ambitious plot for revenge after ruthless casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses Reuben Tishkoff, Danny's friend and mentor. First, Ocean's gang plan to hit Bank in the paycheck by reversing the precept that the house always wins. Next, they will deal a crushing blow to Bank's ego by ruining his reputation as the only hotelier to earn the Royal Review's Five Diamond Award for each of his properties.(n)

programme.title: Any Given Wednesday With Bill Simmons
Point Break
programme.desc: Thrill-seeking criminals perform a series of daredevil stunts to steal money and gems, only to give it away to the poor and less fortunate. Training for a job with the FBI, young recruit Johnny Utah suspects that only extreme athletes could pull off these heists. Utilizing his own special skills, Utah infiltrates the gang of thieves after befriending their charismatic leader, Bodhi. As Johnny experiences the rush of their lifestyle, his superiors fear that his loyalties are being tested.(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: When the principal of a high school retires, two vice principals go to extremes to land the vacant job.(n)

programme.desc: Gamby and Russell invade Dr. Brown's private space; the vice principals are spooked by a school evaluator.(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby tries to impress Amanda while on a field trip organized by the history teacher, Mr. Hayden.(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby and Russell plan to use a homecoming football game as a way to further break Dr. Brown's spirit.(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Dr. Brown orders Gamby to lighten up on discipline; Russell must deal with a disruptive neighbor.(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby and Amanda bond during teacher workday; Russell's patience is tested; Dr. Brown must deal with the sudden appearance of her ex-husband.(n)

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Frank Lucas earns his living as a chauffeur to one of Harlem's leading mobsters. After his boss dies, Frank uses his own ingenuity and strict business code to become one of the inner city's most powerful crime bosses. Meanwhile, veteran cop Richie Roberts senses a change in the mob's power structure and looks for ways to bring his opponent to justice.(n)

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.sub-title: Part 8: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Stone is thrust into the spotlight as a controversy involving the defense emerges.(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Gamby and Amanda bond during teacher workday; Russell's patience is tested; Dr. Brown must deal with the sudden appearance of her ex-husband.(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Disaster strikes on Aug. 5, 2010, as a copper and gold mine collapses in Chile, trapping 33 men underground. With more than 2,000 feet of rock in their way, members of a rescue team work tirelessly for 69 days to save the seemingly doomed crew. Beneath the rubble, the miners begin an epic quest to survive, contending with suffocating heat and the need for food and water. With family, friends and the rest of the world watching, it becomes a race against time and a true test of the human spirit.(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Frustrated at his own failures and disillusioned with professional sports, tennis player Peter Colt resolves to retire from competition and become an instructor at an exclusive private club. But when Colt receives a surprise wild-card berth in Wimbledon, he can't help but enter the tournament. Soon, Colt meets Lizzie Bradbury, a beautiful American tennis player with an upcoming match of her own, and finds the inspiration he hopes will turn his luck around(n).

programme.title: Melvin and Howard
programme.desc: When luckless dreamer Melvin Dummar rescues a grizzled, half-dead man from the desert, he's skeptical of the man's claim that he's actually reclusive billionaire Howard Hughes. But in the wake of Hughes' death a decade later, a will appears naming Melvin the recipient of $156 million, and a media circus ensues. Accused of forgery, Melvin vigorously maintains his innocence despite a strong intuition that he'll never see any of the money(n).

programme.title: The Ladies' Man
programme.desc: Upon losing his lover, Herbert gives up women for good and seeks a fresh start by taking a maintenance position at what appears to be an ordinary Los Angeles boarding house. To Herbert's surprise, however, the building caters specifically to single women. He immediately resolves to quit, but landlady Miss Wellenmellon and sweet tenant Fay talk him into keeping the job. In no time at all, Herbert is mired in one comic disaster after another(n).

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: After losing his position as a minor-league pitcher, Montgomery Brewster learns his great-uncle has left him $300 million. To inherit it, Brewster must spend $30 million in 30 days under a complicated set of rules that forbid him from donating too much to charity or retaining any new assets when the period is up. Unable to share details about the will's odd conditions with anyone, Brewster sets out to spend his money under the stern eye of paralegal Angela Drake(n).

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: When President Ulysses S. Grant learns that diabolical inventor Dr. Arliss Loveless is planning to assassinate him, he orders Civil War hero James West and U.S. Marshal Artemus Gordon (also Kline) to arrest him. West's trigger-happy personality doesn't always mesh well with that of the thoughtful Gordon, but they manage to work together. And with the help of a mysterious stranger, West and Gordon close in on Loveless(n).

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Follows the hilarious path of four African-American men as they take on love, sex, friendship and two of life's most terrifying prospects -- commitment and honesty. Lifelong friends banded together to weather love's innate terrors and occasional triumphs in this brazenly comic yet painfully true exploration of the battle between the sexes. Amidst the career track, basketball and bar hopping, ``The Brothers'' love women -- as many as possible -- but a shocking revelation tests their friendship(n).

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean and his gang hatch an ambitious plot for revenge after ruthless casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses Reuben Tishkoff, Danny's friend and mentor. First, Ocean's gang plan to hit Bank in the paycheck by reversing the precept that the house always wins. Next, they will deal a crushing blow to Bank's ego by ruining his reputation as the only hotelier to earn the Royal Review's Five Diamond Award for each of his properties(n).

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: After a year apart - attending different schools, meeting different people - the guys rent a beach house and vow to make this the best summer ever. As it turns out, whether that will happen or not has a lot to do with the girls. Between the wild parties, outrageous revelations and yes, a trip to band camp, they discover that times change and people change, but in the end, it's all about sticking together(n).

programme.title: Shrink
programme.desc: Henry Carter, a jaded therapist-to-the-stars, uses marijuana to forget his troubles. His first pro bono case puts him in touch with Jemma, a troubled teen who lives far from the glamour of the Hollywood Hills. Confronted with her real problems, Henry wonders, given his current state of mind, if he can help Jemma find answers to her questions(n).

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: The Brothers Grimm, Wilhelm and Jacob, are dysfunctional schemers who go from town to town putting on shows that convince inhabitants they are getting rid of demons. After one such scam, a mysterious man called Cavaldi brings them to a French general, who persuades them to battle the evil that has kidnapped 10 girls from a small village. During the investigation, the cynical Wilhelm and sensitive Jacob see things that point to real magic at work(n).

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: It's been three years since Mike Lane's retirement from stripping, but the former dancer misses the excitement and feeling of being on stage. Most of all, though, he misses the best friends that he ever had, the crew known as the Kings of Tampa. Opportunity comes knocking when the guys look him up as they travel to Myrtle Beach, S.C., for a stripper convention. With the promise of outrageous fun, a reinvigorated Mike can't resist the chance to join in and take it off again(n).

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean and his gang hatch an ambitious plot for revenge after ruthless casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses Reuben Tishkoff, Danny's friend and mentor. First, Ocean's gang plan to hit Bank in the paycheck by reversing the precept that the house always wins. Next, they will deal a crushing blow to Bank's ego by ruining his reputation as the only hotelier to earn the Royal Review's Five Diamond Award for each of his properties(n).

Between the wild parties, outrageous revelations and yes, a trip to band camp, they discover that times change and people change, but in the end, it's all about sticking together.(n)

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. It's up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.(n)

programme.title: One-Night Stand
programme.desc: Louis C.K.(n)

programme.title: Fathers' Day
programme.desc: Jack is a straitlaced lawyer with a loving wife . Dale is suicidal about his stalled career as an artist. The only thing they have in common is Collette, with whom they both had an affair years ago. Unbeknownst to the two men, she had a son, Scott, who is now missing. After she tells Jack and Dale that one of them could be the father, the pair set out to find Scott and prove who the real father is.(n)

programme.title: Life With Mikey
programme.desc: The former child star of a TV show meets a cute little waif who changes his talent agency and his life.(n)

programme.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
programme.desc: Nick Halloway is an average businessman who undergoes an extraordinary change when an experiment gone awry turns him invisible. Government operative David Jenkins discovers Nick in his see-through condition at the scene of the accident and arranges for him to be taken into custody, but he escapes. As Nick tries to find out more about his strange situation, he receives aid from Alice Monroe, a pretty acquaintance who helps him avoid capture.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: When Xerxes, the evil god king of Persia, sends his massive army to Sparta, King Leonidas and 13 strapping warriors rise up to defend their homeland. Leonidas, Captain and the rest face down dancing Persians, bad punch-lines and celebrity look-alikes.(n)

programme.title: State and Main
programme.desc: A big-budget movie crew descends upon a quaint New England village, sowing a bumper crop of corruption, vanity and greed in David Marnet's ``State and Main''; in the days that elapse before the cameras finally roll, money will change hands, careers will be jeopardized and love will blossom in the small-town soil.(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: In this dark comedy, the crotchety Willie T. Stokes and his partner reunite once a year for a holiday con. Posing as a mall Santa and his elf, they rip off shopping outlets on Christmas Eve. This year, however, Willie is falling apart. He's depressed and alcoholic, and his erratic behavior draws the suspicion of mall security . But when befriending a small boy brings out his kinder side, Willie begins to wonder if there is still some hope for him.(n)

programme.title: One-Night Stand
programme.desc: Flight of the Conchords.(n)

programme.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
programme.desc: Miss Mona runs the Chicken Ranch, a brothel with a long history in a small Texas town. The locals have a good relationship with the institution, and Mona is respected in the community. The sheriff, Ed Earl Dodd, also looks out for the Chicken Ranch due to his past with Miss Mona. However, when pious reporter Melvin Thorpe exposes the brothel, outside interests want it shut down, putting the governor in a tough spot.(n)

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A secretly bisexual Brooklynite from a traditional Persian family struggles with her identity and the disintegration of her relationship with her girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: The Bucket List

The men find they have two things in common: a need to come to terms with who they are and what they have done with their lives, and a desire to complete a list of things they want to see and do before they die. Against their doctor's advice, the men leave the hospital and set out on the adventure of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Super Troopers
programme.desc: Always looking for action, five over-enthusiastic but under-stimulated Vermont State Troopers raise hell on the highway, keeping motorists anxiously looking in their rear-view mirrors. Between an ongoing feud with the local cops over whose you-know-what is bigger, and the state government wanting to shut them down, the ``Super Troopers'' find themselves precariously and hilariously heading toward calamity as they try to avoid extinction.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Spartans
programme.desc: When Xerxes, the evil god king of Persia, sends his massive army to Sparta, King Leonidas and 13 strapping warriors rise up to defend their homeland. Leonidas, Captain and the rest face down dancing Persians, bad punch-lines and celebrity look-alikes.(n)

programme.title: Flash of Genius
programme.desc: When college professor and part-time inventor Robert Kearns develops an intermittent windshield wiper, he believes he, his wife and their children will be set for life. Though the invention is a big hit with automakers in 1960s Detroit, Kearns finds himself forced out of the picture. Determined to collect the recognition and financial reward due him, he wages an arduous legal battle with the auto industry(n).

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: In the Mexican town of San Angel, Manolo, Maria and Joaquin have been friends ever since childhood. Although their lives have taken different paths -- Maria was sent to Europe, Joaquin joined the military, and Manolo studied to become a bullfighter -- one thing remains the same: Manolo and Joaquin both want to marry Maria. Little does the trio know that battling husband-and-wife deities have made a high-stakes wager on the love triangle's outcome(n).

programme.desc: A bed-bound boy uses his imagination to experience life. Featuring the voice of Jonathan Pryce(n).

His dream becomes a reality when, unexpectedly, he must fulfill an ancient prophecy and study the skills with his idols, the Furious Five. Po needs all the wisdom, strength and ability he can muster to protect his people from an evil snow leopard(n).

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: In this animated adaptation of Ted Hughes' Cold War fable, a giant alien robot crash-lands near the small town of Rockwell, Maine, in 1957. Exploring the area, a local 9-year-old boy, Hogarth, discovers the robot, and soon forms an unlikely friendship with him. When a paranoid government agent, Kent Mansley, becomes determined to destroy the robot, Hogarth and beatnik Dean McCoppin must do what they can to save the misunderstood machine(n).

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: Casey Carlyle is supposed to go to Harvard, just like her mother . While Casey has the grades to get into her mom's alma mater, what she really wants to do is pursue her passion: figure skating. Both Casey's mom and Gen, the captain of the local team, scoff at the idea of Casey on the ice. But Casey soon finds an unlikely ally, and coach, in Gen's mom, Tina, a former skater trying to live down mistakes from her past(n).

Despite a rocky start to this new arrangement, Dave eventually discovers that the spunky critters have rare singing talent. When the three perform in front of record executive Ian Hawke, he immediately signs them. Although the infectious group rapidly gains in popularity, their loyalty is soon tested(n).

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Life is an adventure for a courageous youngster named Nim, who lives on an exotic island with her marine-biologist father. and a menagerie of animal friends. When Nim's father goes missing, she turns to the only person she knows who can help her: adventurer Alex Rover . But what she doesn't know is that Alex Rover is really Alexandra, a timid recluse. Though faint of heart, Alexandra must find the courage within herself to come to Nim's aid(n).

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a baby, Ella receives a visit from Lucinda, her fairy godmother, and is bestowed with a magical talent that requires her to obey anything that she is told to do. This proves to be more of a curse than a blessing, particularly once her mother dies and she is forced to live with the cruel Dame Olga . Eventually, Ella embarks on a journey to find Lucinda and break the spell, accompanied by the handsome Prince Charmont(n).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks

When the three perform in front of record executive Ian Hawke, he immediately signs them. Although the infectious group rapidly gains in popularity, their loyalty is soon tested(n).

programme.desc: A coming-of-age romantic comedy set against the backdrop of the Cape Cod Baseball League. Local boy Ryan Dunne, now a pitcher for Boston College, meets Tenley Parrish, the daughter of a wealthy couple who summer on the Cape. Ryan and Tenley fall in love, much to the chagrin of their families, while Ryan clings to one last hope of being discovered and signed to a pro baseball contract.(n)

programme.title: The Man With One Red Shoe
programme.desc: As government official Cooper plays a nasty game of one-upsmanship with his rival in hopes of landing a promotion, he is deceived into believing that unassuming violinist Richard is involved in international espionage. Cooper sends his top operative, the gorgeous Maddy, to charm Richard into giving himself away. The naive musician, however, is completely clueless about political intrigue and, sadly, believes he has met the woman of his dreams.(n)
